resources.string: Govt. Polytechnic is situated in the west of the Sirsa City. Its distance is about 5 KM from Main Bus stand & about 4 KM from the Railway station of the city on Rania/Ellenabad road. The institution is spread over an area of 26 acres and has a very good & green campus. It came into existence in 1962 at the time of Joint Punjab by the efforts of Sh. Sardar Partap Singh Kairon, the then Chief Minister of the JointPunjab.
This app is dedicated to my parents.
